access: Due to the use of technology, all gadgets are uncommon or rare, though inventors and regions with access to inventors have access to uncommon gadgets.
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs=""
>
[Blast Boots](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1104)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Gadget" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=405" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 67</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn (attached to footwear or feet)

**Bulk** L
</row>

**Access**  Due to the use of technology, all gadgets are uncommon or rare, though inventors and regions with access to inventors have access to uncommon gadgets.

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These sets of rockets come in pairs and strap onto existing footwear (or a creature's feet). Inserting them and aligning them properly takes 1 minute. When you Activate the blast boots, you can [High Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=36) or [Long Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=37), without the need to Stride first. Higher-level versions increase the distance of your High Jump or Long Jump.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 1"
pfs="Standard"
>
Blast Boots (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 67</row>

**Price** 3 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs="Standard"
>
Blast Boots (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 67</row>

**Price** 11 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

When you Activate the moderate blast boots to High Jump, you can increase the vertical distance of your High Jump by up to 30 feet. When you Activate them to Long Jump, you can increase the horizontal distance of your Long Jump by up to 45 feet.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 9"
pfs="Standard"
>
Blast Boots (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 67</row>

**Price** 140 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

When you Activate the greater blast boots to High Jump, you can increase the vertical distance of your High Jump by up to 50 feet. When you Activate them to Long Jump, you can increase the horizontal distance of your Long Jump by up to 75 feet. Additionally, for 1 minute, the greater blast boots continue to boost your jumps. Every time you [Leap](/Actions.aspx?ID=81) during the duration, you can move 30 feet in any direction, or your normal Leap distance, whichever is further.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 17"
pfs="Standard"
>
Blast Boots (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 67</row>

**Price** 2,750 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

When you Activate the major blast boots to High Jump, you can increase the vertical distance of your High Jump by up to 80 feet. When you Activate them to Long Jump, you can increase the horizontal distance of your Long Jump by up to 120 feet. Additionally, for 1 minute, the major blast boots remain active, allowing you to clumsily fly through the air for the duration. You gain a 30-foot Fly speed for the duration, but any time you Fly, you are [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) until the start of your next turn.
name: Blast Boots (Major)
